template.name: Blank HTML
template.description: Use this template to add custom HTML code. You can use javascript, CSS styles, and any standard HTML tags.
template.text: Use this template to add custom HTML code. You can use javascript, CSS styles, and any standard HTML tags.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body> </html>

template.name: Google Document
template.description: Create and share documents on the web and access them from any computer or smart phone. The familiar desktop feel makes collaborative editing easy.
template.text:
1. Open documents
2. Open document you want to add.
3. At the top menu press File -> Publish to the web -> Start publishing -> OK.
4. Copy embed code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
5. Add width="100%" height="100%" inside iframe tag.
template.code: <!-- paste code here -->

template.name: Google Spreadsheet
template.description: Create and share spreadsheets online. Google spreadsheets makes it easy to track budgets, run financial calculations, track data and more.
template.text:
1. Open documents
2. Open document you want to add.
3. At the top menu press File -> Publish to the web -> Start publishing -> OK.
4. Under "Get a link to the published data" press the button and select "Html to embed in a page".
5. Copy embed code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
6. Change width="100%" height="100%" inside iframe tag.
template.code: <!-- paste code here -->

template.name: Google Calendar
template.description: Organizing your schedule shouldn't be a burden. With Google Calendar, it's easy to keep track of life's important events all in one place.
template.text:
1. Open Google Calendar.
2. Near the calendar push the button and select "Share this Calendar".
3. Copy embed code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
4. Change width="100%" height="100%" inside iframe tag.
template.code: <!-- paste code here -->

template.name: Picasa Slideshow
template.description: Fast and easy photo sharing from Google. Share with friends and family, or explore public photos.
template.text:
1. Open album in your Picasa account.
2. Press "Link to this album" at the right.
3. Press "Embed Slideshow".
4. Select slideshow size.
5. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
6. Resize module to fit selected size.
template.code: <!-- paste code here -->

template.name: Google Maps
template.description: Find local businesses, view maps and get driving directions in Google Maps
template.text:
1. Open Maps and find a place you want to display.
2. Press "Link" at the top left corner.
3. Press "Customize and preview embedded map".
4. Select map size.
5. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
6. Change width="100%" height="100%" inside iframe tag.
template.code: <!-- paste code here -->

template.name: YouTube
template.description: YouTube is a place to discover, watch, upload and share videos.
template.text:
1. Open YouTube and find the video you want to add.
2. Press "Share" button below the video and press "Embed" button afterwards.
3. Select video size.
4. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
5. Change width="100%" height="100%" inside iframe tag.
template.code: <!-- paste code here -->

template.name: Profile Widget
template.description: Display your most recent Twitter updates on any webpage.
template.text:
1. Open Profile Widget.
2. Fill in widget settings and press "Create widget".
3. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Search Widget
template.description: Displays search results in real time! Ideal for live events, broadcastings, conferences, TV Shows, or even just keeping up with the news.
template.text:
1. Open Search Widget.
2. Type in "Search Query".
3. Fill in widget settings and press "Create widget"
4. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Favorites Widget

template.text:

2. Fill in widget settings and press "Create widget"
3. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.

template.name: IntenseDebate
template.description: IntenseDebate's comment system enhances and encourages conversation on your blog or website.
template.text:
1. Open IntenseDebate.
2. Signup and add your website.
3. Get verification email and follow installation instructions.
4. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Disqus
template.description: Disqus is a global comment system that improves discussion on websites and connects conversations across the web.
template.text:
1. Open Disqus.
2. Signup and add your website.
3. Get verification email and follow installation instructions.
4. Select "Universal code".
5. Copy embed code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Like Button
template.description: The Like button lets users share pages from your site back to their Facebook profile with one click.
template.text:
1. Open Like button page.
2. Type url to like and customize button style.
3. Press "Get code".
4. Copy code from both block and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Comments
template.description: The Comments plugin lets users comment on any piece of content on your site.
template.text:
1. Open Comments.
2. Type in URL to comment on and customize Comments Box.
3. Press "Get code".
4. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Activity Feed
template.description: The Activity Feed plugin shows users what their friends are doing on your site through likes and comments.
template.text:
1. Open Activity Feed.
2. Type in Domain and customize plugin.
3. Press "Get code".
4. Copy "iframe" code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Recommendations
template.description: The Recommendations plugin gives users personalized suggestions for pages on your site they might like.
template.text:
1. Open Recommendations.
2. Type in Domain and customize plugin.
3. Press "Get code".
4. Copy "iframe" code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Like Box
template.description: The Like Box enables users to like your Facebook Page and view its stream directly from your website.
template.text:
1. Open Like Box.
2. Type in "Facebook Page URL" and customize plugin.
3. Press "Get code".
4. Copy "iframe" code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Groups
template.description: Community widget helps you connect your site to an appropriate usergroup or fanpage at Vkontakte. This widget allows one to subscribe to community news without leaving current page.
template.text:
1. Open Groups.
2. Type in page url and customize plugin.
3. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Jot Form
template.description: JotForm is the first web based WYSIWYG form builder. Its intuitive drag and drop user interface makes form building a breeze. Using JotForm, you can create forms, integrate them to your site and receive responses by email.
template.text:
1. Open Dropbox forms and press "Create a Dropbox Form".
2. Login to your Dropbox account.
3. Follow instructions and press "Launch From Builder".
4. Press "Embed Form" and select "iFrame".
5. Copy embed code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <!-- paste code here -->

template.name: DROPitTOme
template.description: With DROPitTOme you can securely receive files from anyone to your Dropbox account.
template.text:
1. Open DROPitTOme and register.
2. Get you own unique upload address.
3. Paste url to the src attribute of the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <iframe src="- Paste your url here -" width="100%" height="100%"></iframe>

template.name: Box
template.description: Box is a simple, scalable and affordable solution to manage documents, media and all your content online. Share files as a link. Sync files on the desktop. Its file sharing, reinvented.
template.text:
1. Open Box and signup.
2. Create new folder and select it.
3. Click "Folder Options", "Share" and "Embed folder in your site".
4. Configure width and height.
5. Copy embed code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
6. Set width="100%" height="100%".
template.code: <!-- paste code here -->

template.name: Flickr Badge
template.description: Flickr is almost certainly the best online photo management and sharing application in the world. Show off your favorite photos and videos to the world, securely and privately show content to your friends and family, or blog the photos and videos you take with a cameraphone.
template.text:
1. Open Flickr and signup.
2. Open Flickr badge.
3. Select html or flash version and follow instructions.
4. Copy code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head /><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Blogger
template.description: Blogger is a blog-publishing service that allows private or multi-user blogs with time-stamped entries.
template.text:
1. Open Blogger and signup.
2. Create blog.
3. Copy link to your blog and paste to the src attribute of the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <iframe src="- Paste your blog url here -" width="100%" height="100%"></iframe>

template.name: Meebo
template.description: Meebo gives you the freedom to share. Whether you use Meebo here or on your favorite sites around the web, Meebo brings you and your friends together.
template.text:
1. Open Meebo and signup.
2. Go to "Preferences" and select "Meebo Me Widgets".
3. Name new widget.
4. Copy embed code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Email Me Form
template.description: Email Me Form is a free online form generator service that helps you create HTML forms for your website, with no programming required.
template.text:
1. Open Email Me Form and signup.
2. Create new form.
3. Edit your form and save it.
4. Open "Forms manager" and than "Code".
5. Select "Html with Javascript/CSS".
6. Copy embed code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Nabble Forum
template.description: Add your free forum or any other hosted application to your website quick and easy.
template.text:
1. Open Nabble forum and register.
2. Open created forum.
3. Select "Options", "Embedding options".
4. Copy embed code and paste to the "HTML Code" section.
5. In the module's properties panel check "Show scrollbars" option.
template.code: <html><head></head><body style="background: transparent; border: none;"> <!-- paste code here --> </body></html>

template.name: Vimeo
template.description: Vimeo is a respectful community of creative people who are passionate about sharing the videos they make.
template.text:
1. Open Vimeo and find the video you want to add.
2. Press "Embed" button and copy code.
3. Paste code to the "HTML Code" section.
4. Resize module to fit selected size.
template.code: <!-- paste code here -->

template.name: SoundCloud
template.description: Create, record and share the sounds you create anywhere to friends, family and the world with SoundCloud, the world's largest community of sound creators.
template.text:
1. Open SoundCloud and sign up.
2. Click the Share button above each Soundcloud music player to get the embed code.
3. Paste code to the "HTML Code" section.
template.code: <!-- paste code here -->
